services.header_desc: Because a professional bike should never be immobilized, we have designed a proactive and mobile after-sales service.

workshop.title: Cargo Mobile Workshop
workshop.desc_1: No need to bring your bikes to the store. Our technician comes directly to your site with a fully equipped cargo workshop bike.
workshop.desc_2: On-site intervention to limit team downtime.

maintenance.title: Preventive Maintenance
maintenance.desc: Scheduling revisions to anticipate breakdowns. We track the mileage of your fleet and intervene before wear becomes critical.

packs.title: Technical Packs
packs.desc_sub: Modular packs, from essential to premium level, according to your usage and terrain constraints.
packs.winter_desc: Designed for daily use in cold, humid and snowy conditions. Studded or lamellized tires, neoprene battery protection, reinforced lighting.

security.title: Security & Serenity
security.desc: Protect your investment and your employees.
security.text_1: Certified locks, integrated GPS trackers, high visibility helmets provided.
security.text_2: Protection level adaptable according to the value of the bike and professional usage.

cta_banner.title: A problem with a bike?
cta_banner.desc: Contact our dedicated pro support. Priority intervention guaranteed for fleet contracts.

about_page.hero_desc: Professional mobility, born in the Alps to adapt everywhere.
about_page.intro_quote: "The mountain is a demanding environment. What works here, works everywhere."
about_page.intro_text: ACS was born from a simple observation in Savoie: professionals need absolute reliability. <2>We are not just bike enthusiasts. We are logistics experts. Our mission is to provide tools (bikes) and services (maintenance) capable of withstanding the harshest conditions.</2>

expansion.title: From Savoie to International
expansion.desc: If the activity starts in Savoie, birthplace of our expertise, it extends today everywhere in France and very soon in Switzerland. We carry our alpine requirement to all new territories.

expertise.title: Cutting-edge Technique
expertise.desc: Our bikes are not toys. Certified Bosch eBike Systems and partners Valeo, we master complex motorizations adapted to load and slope.

ecology.title: Total Consistency
ecology.desc: We don't just sell soft mobility, we apply it. All our internal logistics are designed to reduce the carbon footprint, regardless of the intervention location.

cta.title: Want to join the movement?
cta.desc: Whether you are in the mountains, in the city or elsewhere, we have a solution to facilitate your daily life.

ai.title: AI Quote Assistant
ai.desc: Not sure which equipment to choose? Describe your activity (e.g., "I deliver pizza in Les Arcs"), and our AI will suggest the best configuration.

1.title: The Alpine Daily
1.target: For who? Individuals, Staff shuttles, Administrations.
1.description: Forget the fragile city bike. Here we are talking about an open but rigid frame, capable of swallowing the slopes of Bourg-Saint-Maurice without flinching.

2.title: The All-Path Adventurer
2.target: For who? Rental companies, Guides, Inter-resort trips.
2.description: The SUV of electric bikes. Suspended, robust and autonomous, it goes from the road to the drivable paths without compromise on comfort.

3.title: The Car Alternative
3.target: For who? Long distance commuters, Valley-Resort link.
3.description: For those who count in minutes. A real alternative to the car for home-work trips of more than 10km.

4.title: The Station Wagon
4.target: For who? Families (2 children), Craftsmen, Express delivery.
4.description: The loading capacity of a cargo, the agility of a classic bike. Ideal for dropping the kids at school then going to a construction site.
tech: Compatible with child seats & Euro crates

5.title: The Heavy Carrier
5.target: For who? Volume transport, Small logistics, Young children.
5.description: The box in the front allows you to keep an eye on your load (or your children). Low center of gravity for maximum stability.

6.title: The Heavy Utility
6.target: For who? Communities, Urban cleanliness, Last mile logistics.
6.description: Absolute stability at a standstill as well as under load. Designed to replace small thermal vehicles in pedestrian zones.

7.title: The Extension Module
7.target: For who? Any professional having a punctual need for volume.
7.description: Transform any bike in the range into a logistics tool. Braked, secure and modular trailers.
